definition: diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek
to soar/to gallop/to prance/to turn over/to vacate/to clear
Wolf Totem, novel by Lü Jiamin aka Jiang Rong

sentences.english: The dragon is a totem of the Chinese nation.
Its emblem changed from the bird to the snake, and then tot…
sentences.chinese: 巴人之族徽由鳥而蛇而虎，最終以白虎爲圖騰。

sentences.english: An interesting book I have read is "Totem of wolves ".
sentences.chinese: 我曾經讀過的一本很有意思的書，名叫《狼圖騰》。

sentences.english: They argue the institute, which will occupy a former divinity school building, is a totem to the late Friedman who they call a dinosaur of economic thought.
sentences.chinese: 他們聲稱這個研究所是已故弗裏德曼的圖騰。

sentences.english: Also, each group had a totem animal which it was forbidden to kill.
sentences.chinese: 同時，各部族均有圖騰動物禁屠。

sentences.english: Worshipping Pangu dates back to the ancient customs of Pangu totem worship and Pangu mythology.
sentences.chinese: 盤瓠祭起源於遠古的盤瓠圖騰崇拜和盤瓠神話。

sentences.english: Stoneskin Totem now increases armor instead of reducing physical damage.
sentences.chinese: 石膚圖騰現在增加護甲而非降低物理傷害。

sentences.english: A totemic warrior who strikes foes with weapons imbued with elemental power.
sentences.chinese: 一個用充滿元素力量來製造攻擊的圖騰戰士。

sentences.english: Xiaogang has an almost totemic significance.
sentences.chinese: 小崗村幾乎算是一個圖騰。

sentences.english: In the middle of the centerpiece mosaic hangs a chandelier encased in a blue glass cube.
sentences.chinese: 頂面馬賽克圖騰的中心掛着罩着藍色玻璃的枝形吊燈。

sentences.english: No "Wolf totem" how can we believe that the reality of the book?
sentences.chinese: 沒有《狼圖騰》這本書我們又怎能相信這一現實呢？

sentences.english: How did the ideal of voting the right person replace the authoritarian ruling?
sentences.chinese: 威權的圖騰又怎會被選賢與能的理想給替代？

sentences.english: Soon to be added to that list is the translation of a long fiction called "Wolf Totem".
sentences.chinese: 不久長篇小說《狼圖騰》也加入了這個行列。

sentences.english: Houston’s totem could be the Imp of Incongruity.
sentences.chinese: 休斯敦的圖騰可能正是一個代表不協調的神靈。

sentences.english: Then why is it Mom's are usually the low woman on the totem pole?
sentences.chinese: 然後爲什麼媽媽通常在圖騰柱底層的地方？

sentences.english: Panhu and Wang Yao is set totem worship and ancestor worship.
sentences.chinese: 而盤瓠和盤王是瑤族的圖騰崇拜和祖先崇拜。

definition: vein lines (in marble or fingerprint)/grain (in wood etc)
to conform (with)/to echo/to correlate well/(linguistics) agreement
